description: The Japanese anemone (Anemone 'Red Riding Hood') is a captivating flower sure to add drama and beauty to any garden. Its luminous red petals create an eye-catching contrast to its bright green foliage. This plant brings strong sprays of fragrant blooms each early Fall, captivating viewers with the velvety petals radiating out from its center. It is quite hardy and performs wonderfully in shade and partial shade, making it perfect for narrow or dark spaces that need a pop of color. Its luxurious blooms will bring joy to your garden year after year.
